long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download images with just a few clicks from the Pexels website!

This revolutionary tool allows you to easily download images from Pexels to your computer. Remember to respect copyright and avoid using protected content without permission.

üí¨ Amazing Features of Quick Mass Image Downloader:

‚úì Save images to a local computer.

‚úì Download multiple images at once with just a few clicks.

‚úì Support for all image formats offered by Pexels, including JPG and more!

‚úì No need for complicated passwords or logins.

‚úì Intuitive and secure interface for an unparalleled user experience.

‚úì Enable automatic downloads in your browser and quickly batch download images.

‚úì Developer support is available 24/7 to help whenever you need it.

‚úì Free users have usage limitations, including an image limit and a 3-minute waiting time before being able to download more images again. Whenever the image download limit is exceeded, a new tab will open in the browser, taking you to our premium version page with unlimited features, where you can purchase our premium version for a single fee.

‚úì With our premium license you have unlimited access to all features, with no image limits or waiting time.

It is a Chrome extension and can be installed for online use on Mac and Windows computers. Just add it to your browser; No additional software is required.


Usage guide for you:

1. Install the Chrome extension.

2.Visit the pexels website.

3.Enable automatic download permissions (Note: Right after allowing automatic downloads, the browser will ask you to refresh the page).

4.Click the ‚ÄúExtension‚Äù button next to your profile avatar and select the plugin, click the ‚ÄúPushpin‚Äù icon on the right to pin it to the toolbar.

5.Browse the content, with "CROLLBAR", and click on the download images button.

Quick Mass Image Downloader

This extension is not affiliated with the official Pexels app/website. This is an unofficial app independently developed and maintained.
